sidebar.infoText: Tell us what you are commenting on (picture, link, status update, ...) Tell us who posted/shared it (you, a friend, a user who is not your friend, a page, ...) Tell us why you decided to share something with a certain audience.
sidebar.ratingEntertain: How entertaining is this content to you
sidebar.ratingAppropriate: Do you think it is appropriate to show this content on Facebook
sidebar.ratingInteresting: Did you find the content you were just reading interesting
sidebar.ratingEnjoy: Did you enjoy what you were just reading
sidebar.questionNotice: Why did you notice this post?
sidebar.questionQuality: Did you examine the quality of the information? If so, how?
